        Constructor for Student
        Parameters:
        i - int to be added to the String of the Student name
        completeCourse - For storing the Students completed Course
        incompleteCourse - For storing the Students incompleted Course
        bookToGive - For storing a Book to the Student
        answerToCourse - For storing a String to the Student
